mapper.select: /* common.selectFileInfo */ SELECT stor_file_nm ,file_ext ,upload_path ,path ,org_file_nm FROM kcgbd.t_cmmn_file_info WHERE 1=1 AND stor_file_nm = #{stor_file_nm} AND del_yn = 'N'

/* common.getUserInfoFromIam */ SELECT usr.userid AS user_id ,usr.name ,usr.dept ,usr.dept_mogahacd AS deptMogahacd ,usr.rdept_mogahacd AS rdeptMogahacd ,usr.fdeptnm ,usr.tdeptnm AS tdept_nm ,usr.ldeptnm ,usr.sdeptnm ,usr.jikgubcd AS jikgub_cd ,usr.jikgubnm AS jikgub_nm ,usr.positioncd ,usr.positionnm ,usr.statuscd AS status_cd ,(SELECT a.value FROM AO_IAM.VAOI_PPSS_USER_MAP_BD a WHERE a.name = usr.statuscd ) AS statusnm FROM AO_IAM.VAOI_PPSS_USER_MAP_BD usr WHERE 1=1 AND usr.userid = #{user_id}

/* common.getUserAuthInfo */ SELECT tu.user_id ,tu.auth_cd ,ta.auth_nm ,ta.admin_yn ,tu.iam_yn ,tu.status_cd ,tu."name" ,tu.jikgub_cd ,tu.jikgub_nm ,tu.dept ,tu.tdept_nm ,tu.email ,tu.del_yn FROM kcgbd.t_user tu , kcgbd.t_auth ta WHERE tu.auth_cd = ta.auth_cd AND tu.user_id = #{user_id}

/* common.getNotiList */ SELECT A.target_idx ,A.target_cat ,A.target_user_id ,A.reg_dt ,to_char(A.reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_dt_char FROM kcgbd.t_req_noti A WHERE 1=1 AND A.target_user_id = #{user_id}
/* common.getNotiCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kcgbd.t_req_noti WHERE 1=1 AND target_user_id = #{user_id}

/* common.getDownloadReqInfo */ SELECT CONCAT( B.table_korean_nm ,' (' ,(SELECT count(*) FROM kcgbd.t_download_req_dtl WHERE download_req_idx = A.idx) ,'개 컬럼)' ) subject , ,(SELECT code_nm FROM kcgbd.t_cmmn_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'APRVCD' AND code_id = B.req_sts) status FROM kcgbd.t_download_req A ,kcgbd.t_rule_meta_0002 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.db_table_id = B.db_table_id AND A.idx = #{target_idx}

/* common.getAnalToolReqInfo */ SELECT A.sbjt subject ,(SELECT code_nm FROM kcgbd.t_cmmn_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'APRVCD' AND code_id = A.req_sts) status FROM kcgbd.t_anal_tool_req A WHERE 1=1 AND A.idx = #{target_idx}

/* common.getDataAnalReqInfo */ SELECT A.sbjt subject ,(SELECT code_nm FROM kcgbd.t_cmmn_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'APRVCD' AND code_id = A.req_sts) status FROM kcgbd.t_data_anal_req A WHERE 1=1 AND A.idx = #{target_idx}

/* common.getDataAnalReqInfo */ SELECT A.sbjt subject ,(SELECT code_nm FROM kcgbd.t_cmmn_code WHERE code_grp_id = 'APRVCD' AND code_id = A.req_sts) status FROM kcgbd.t_data_collect_req A WHERE 1=1 AND A.idx = #{target_idx}

/* common.getSearchWordList */ SELECT B.keyword FROM ( SELECT A.keyword ,SUM(A.keyword_cnt) cnt FROM kcgbd.t_keyword_log A WHERE 1=1 and A.reg_date >= to_char(current_timestamp + '-7 days', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY cnt desc ) B LIMIT 5
